mapper.select: SELECT B.*, CASE WHEN B.TOPIC_NO = 6 THEN '익명' ELSE (SELECT M.nickname FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.member_no = B.member_no LIMIT 1) END AS nickname, (SELECT T.topic_name FROM TOPIC T WHERE T.cat_no = B.cat_no LIMIT 1) AS topic_name FROM BOARD B WHERE B.cat_no = 1 ORDER BY b_no DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT B.*, (SELECT M.nickname FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.member_no = B.member_no LIMIT 1) AS nickname, (SELECT T.topic_name FROM TOPIC T WHERE T.cat_no = B.cat_no LIMIT 1) AS topic_name FROM BOARD B WHERE B.cat_no = 2 ORDER BY b_no DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT B.*, (SELECT M.nickname FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.member_no = B.member_no LIMIT 1) AS nickname, (SELECT T.topic_name FROM TOPIC T WHERE T.cat_no = B.cat_no LIMIT 1) AS topic_name FROM BOARD B WHERE B.cat_no = 4 ORDER BY b_no DESC LIMIT 5;
